answers.answer: Hi there!I am not really sure about the supply of diabetic formulas in NHS, though I would suggest talking this with his dietician or contacting the NHS helpline for information.Take care!

question: Hi   My son 49 years old has prog/MS and in bed on a P.E.G at home with FULL time Care the last 10 years, recently due to wound his Diabetic condition has worsened and now needs injections rather than pills, Of course his sugar levels have risen shapely and his local NHS dietician says she cannot supply (diabetes-specific formulas) through the NHS,  so please can you direct me to where I can purchase such Formulas High in M.U.F.A s - Fructose - Fiber     Brenda UK
title: diabetes-specific formulas
